title: Ready, Set, Bike!
description: It's spring! Time to prepare the bikes. In Ready, Set, Bike!, a boy and his dad check their bikes before they take a ride. Students have the opportunity to ask and answer questions as well as make inferences in this informative book. Detailed, supportive photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support readers.
reviewWords: brakes, fasten, gears, helmet, inner tube, oil, patch, pump, smoothly
comprehension: Make Inferences/Draw Conclusions                : Make inferences / Draw conclusions
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /a/ sound
grammar: Simple Predicates                : Recognize and locate simple predicates
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Understand and arrange words in alphabetical order
